dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.setupSuccess: Next.js + Ant Design + i18next Setup Successful!
dashboard.description: This is a test page to verify that Next.js, Ant Design 6.x dark theme, and i18next internationalization are working correctly.

providers.title: Providers
providers.keepExistingCredentials: Leave empty to keep existing credentials
providers.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this provider?
providers.autoDetectOnlyInElectron: Auto detection is only available in Electron client
providers.pleaseSelectTokens: Please select at least one token
providers.exportWarning: Export file contains sensitive credentials. Please keep it secure!
providers.skipExisting: Skip existing providers with same name

tokenPreview.title: Detected Tokens
tokenPreview.description: Select tokens to import from the detected list. Expired tokens with refresh tokens will be automatically refreshed after import.

oauth.title: Add Provider via OAuth
oauth.googleDesc: Sign in with your Google account
oauth.githubDesc: Sign in with your GitHub account
oauth.awsBuilderIDDesc: Sign in with AWS Builder ID (Device Code)
oauth.awsBuilderIDWarning: Warning: Do not use temporary email addresses, or you may get 403 blocked
oauth.completeInBrowser: Please complete authentication in the browser...
oauth.enterCodeDesc: Enter the code above at the authentication page...
oauth.authSuccess: Authentication successful! Configure your provider below.
oauth.identityCenterDesc: Sign in with IAM Identity Center (requires organization setup)
oauth.identityCenterInfo: IAM Identity Center allows you to sign in with your organization identity. You need to get the Start URL from your organization administrator.
oauth.startUrlInvalid: Invalid Start URL format, expected https://d-xxxxxxxx.awsapps.com/start

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.copyWarning: Make sure to copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again!
apiKeys.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?

users.title: Users
users.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

usage.title: Usage
usage.noProviders: No providers found. Add a provider first to view usage.

settings.title: Settings

strategies.lruDesc: Prioritize providers that haven't been used recently for even distribution
strategies.roundRobinDesc: Cycle through providers in ID order
strategies.leastUsageDesc: Prioritize providers with least remaining quota for concentrated consumption
strategies.mostUsageDesc: Prioritize providers with most remaining quota for balanced consumption
strategies.oldestFirstDesc: Prioritize oldest created providers for concentrated consumption

settings.usageSyncIntervalDesc: Interval for background sync of provider usage information
settings.healthCheckIntervalDesc: Interval for background provider health checks
settings.maxErrorCountDesc: Provider will be marked unhealthy after this many consecutive errors
settings.requestMaxRetriesDesc: Maximum retry attempts for a single failed request
settings.updateAvailableMsg: New version {{version}} is available. Please download the update.
settings.upToDateMsg: You are using the latest version.
settings.autoLaunchDesc: Automatically start the app when system boots
settings.systemPromptDesc: System prompt to inject when forwarding requests, will be added to the system field of each request

integration.title: Integration Guide
integration.description: Learn how to integrate OctoProxy with various tools and applications

electronKey.activeBanner: Electron Auto Key is active. Configuration below uses your API Key.
electronKey.disabledBanner: Electron Auto Key is disabled. Please enable it in API Keys page or create a new key.
electronKey.regenerateTooltip: Generate a new API Key (old key will be invalidated)
electronKey.regenerateConfirm: Are you sure you want to regenerate the Electron Key? The old key will be invalidated immediately.

claudeCode.tip: Claude Code is Anthropic's official command-line AI programming assistant that supports custom API endpoints
claudeCode.jsonConfigDesc: Add the following to your Claude Code configuration file:
claudeCode.jsonConfigPath: Config file path: ~/.claude/settings.json (global) or .claude/settings.json in your project directory (project-level)
claudeCode.jsonConfigAdvancedTitle: Advanced Configuration (Use Same Model for All)
claudeCode.jsonConfigAdvancedDesc: If you want all model selections to use the same model (e.g., claude-opus-4-5), use this configuration:
claudeCode.cliConfigDesc: You can also configure Claude Code via command line:
claudeCode.step1Desc: Configure Claude Code to use OctoProxy as the API endpoint
claudeCode.step2Desc: Use the API key you created in OctoProxy
claudeCode.step3Desc: Now you can use Claude Code normally
claudeCode.envVarsDesc: You can also configure Claude Code by setting environment variables

openai.tip: OctoProxy provides OpenAI-compatible API endpoints that work with any tool supporting the OpenAI API

claude.tip: OctoProxy also provides native Claude API endpoints compatible with the Anthropic SDK

other.title: Other Tools
other.cursorDesc: Cursor is an AI-powered code editor that supports custom OpenAI-compatible endpoints
other.cursorStep2: Find the Models or OpenAI configuration section
other.continueDesc: Continue is a VS Code AI programming extension. Add the following to ~/.continue/config.json:
other.aiderDesc: Aider is a command-line AI programming tool. Configure via environment variables:
other.lobechatDesc: LobeChat is an open-source AI chat application. Configure the OpenAI provider in settings:
